actions.description: The archdruid makes three Staff or Wildfire attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 21 (6d6) poison damage.
actions.name: Staff

actions.description: 9 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (6d6 + 5) fire damage, and the target is blinded until the start of the druid's next turn.
actions.name: Wildfire

actions.description:
The archdruid casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):
At will: beast sense, entangle, speak with animals

3/day each: animal messenger, dominate beast, faerie fire, tree stride

1/day each: commune with nature (as an action), mass cure wounds
actions.name: Spellcasting
